title: Arsenal and Tottenham to battle it out for Schalke ace Leon Goretzka after he rejected new deal
text:
battle of North London Arsenal and Tottenham to battle it out for Schalke ace Leon Goretzka after he rejected new deal 
Germany international could be available at a cut-price fee with just 12 months left on his contract Gossip Comments NORTH London rivals Tottenham and Arsenal will battle it out for Schalke star Leon Goretzka. 
The midfielder has thrown his future up in the air after rejecting the chance to pen a new contract at the Bundesliga club. Getty Images 4 Arsenal and Tottenham will battle it out for Schalke’s Leon Goretzka 
The talented 22-year-old has just over 12 months left on his current contract forcing the club to cash in this summer or risk losing him on a free. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal and Tottenham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And that has sparked the interest of the Premier League duo who believe they can bag Goretzka in a bargain deal. 
Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger is desperate to revamp his faltering squad this summer after watching his side crumble in both the Premier League and Champions League. AP:Associated Press 4 The 22-year-old has three Germany caps to his name 
The future of Mesut Ozil remains in doubt whilst the likes of Aaron Ramsey and Francis Coquelin have struggled to find form this campaign. 
Valued at around £20million, Spurs believe they can challenge the Gunners to his signature as they aim to achieve Champions League football according to the Mirror . Mauricio Pochettino could use the cash if he sells Moussa Sissoko to lure Goretzka to White Hart Lane. 
The Germany international has been a key figure in Schalke’s first-team this season, starting 22 league matches and scoring four goals.
